body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount for Ring/Blink Wireless Door Bells 4/3/2/1/(2020 Release) Adjustable Holder, No-Drill Easy-Install Mounting Bracket Accessories for Home/Apartments/Office/Rental
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 35 mins
features: Anti-Theft Robust Design: Experience peace of mind with MiPremium's Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount. Meticulously crafted by top designers with sleek design, yet ensuing the robust design safeguards your doorbell being stollen by the bad guys. It cannot be removed from the side of your door unless the door is open. Perfect for your house, business, office, apartment, dormitories or rental property and more.

Unobstructed Motion Sensor Functionality & Universal Door Fit : Unlike other doorbell mounts, MiPremium's innovative design ensures your doorbell's motion sensor and night vision are never blocked, enhancing security without compromising functionality. Suitable for most doors, supporting door thicknesses from 0.6 to 2.3 inches (measure your door thickness before ordering). Fits doors that open left or right. (Doors must be opened inward!)

Broad Doorbells Compatibility: Our doorbell mount seamlessly fits a wide range of wireless doorbells, including Blink and all Ring models 1, 2, 3, 3 Plus, 4 and Ring Video Doorbell (2nd Generation - 2020 Release). It's designed to accommodate doorbells that are up to 2.55 inches W x 5.11 inches H x 1.14 inches D, ensuring a perfect fit for your doorbell. (Doorbell not included in the package)

Effortless No-Drill Installation: Installing your video doorbell is a breeze with our no-drill, easy-install mount. Simply place your doorbell inside the shell and adjust the clip to your door's thickness, it is that easy! There are installation instructions and various parts in the package. - no tools required! This user-friendly design keeps your door intact while ensuring a stable setup.

Do Not Damage another Doorbell: The sleek, cooling-efficient design with strategically placed vents for optimal doorbell performance, enhancing longevity. Attaches securely in seconds and easily installs and uninstalls. No drilling, no damaging doors or walls, making it ideal for apartments, rentals, and temporary residences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No one is stealing your ring doorbell...
reviews.reviewText: This thing is made of some sturdy steel similar of what you'd find in window guards and there is no way someone will be able to steal your Ring doorbell. They'd really have to break the door, even then you wouldn't be able to get it out. This also allows you to place it on the most optimal spot on your door too, and it can handle doors of almost any thickness that you'd normally see. (Not super thin ones, though). This is supposed to work with Blink doorbells as well, but I couldn't try that out. Nothing is blocked on the camera and infrared signals and it's actually designed with a slight shade which might help with rain or sunlight, but not sure how much effect that will have given this is against your door.I really don't know how else you'd want to mount your doorbell now if you have a door that this will fit. You don't want to mount it naked on your door frame anymore, if you ask me. This is pretty much the perfect solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this anti theft doorbell holder on a whim hoping it would fit my ring doorbell. I have to say this device is genius, not only does it securely hold my ring doorbell but aesthetically it looks better than just mounting my ring doorbell to the wall or door. The setup is super easy whether you're a renter or home owner which I love. If your home doesn't have a porch the protector actually has a ledge that can help protect against the rain and elements which is nice. Honestly for the price it's a steal because your ring doorbell is an investment and you need to protect your investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars seems really secure
reviews.reviewText: I just put the Ring doorbell into the security sleeve and attached it to the door. Seems pretty secure this way.The directions were semi comprehensive, but not complete. There is a lot of extra packing stuff/filters in the box so your device won't slide around once it's in the doorbell case, but I guess it could be for a blink device which is slimmer - IDK. Once it's on the door, test to make sure you have it tight enough and your done. Quick and easy. But like I said there is a lot of extra padding/filters, if someone knows where they go please lemme know! Thanks
